text: Alexander Zane Reid Lowe (born 7 August 1973) is a New Zealand radio disc jockey in the United Kingdom. He presents an early evening show on the British music radio station BBC Radio 1 on Mondays to Thursdays. Lowe also presented shows on the music television station MTV2. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Auckland Category:New Zealand radio personalities Category:New Zealand television presenters
title: Zane Lowe
